alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pasco, north central Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 142 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Keystone, or 8 miles west of Lutz. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lutz, Land O Lakes, Keystone, Greater Northdale, Citrus Park, East Lake, Lake Magdalene, Oldsmar, Trinity, Westchase, Odessa, Jay B Starkey Wilderness Park, Lake Fern, and Cheval. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
